Text.Page:
It's hard to report back to Otus. The {@LinkCreature:11#2003#Red Lash sentinels} may not be smart, but they're sharp-eyed.

I think they're noticing some inconsistencies in my disguise. Body language, maybe? I'm not sure.

If they were too worried about a murderous to notice, me, though...hey, that's a plan!
What a relief. Getting this disguise together took a lot of work. All it takes is one overly curious sentinel to ruin everything.
